I am proud to introduce this bipartisan legislation to ensure our great American truckers have basic access to restroom facilities while working. Bill aims to provide restroom access to truckers A new bipartisan bill supported by the Owner-Operator Independent Drivers Association aims to make sure truck drivers have restroom access when they are waiting at a shipper or receiver.
